text: man kan yaetaqid 'ana allah taealaa ln yuayid rasulih mhmdana bialnasr fi aldunya b'izhar dynh, wafi alakhirat b'iela' drjth, wedhab man kdhdhabh, flyamdud hbla 'iilaa saqf baytih wlykhnq bih nfsh, thuma lyaqtae dhlk alhbl, thuma lynzr: hal yudhhibnn dhlk ma yajid fi nafsih min alghyz? fa'iina allah taealaa nasr nabih mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wasalam la mhalt
